```{r load libraries}

df<-read.csv("07162025_duplicated_gene_set_updated.csv")

# Expand each row into 6 rows
expanded <- do.call(rbind, apply(df, 1, function(row) {
  fam <- row["fam"]
  A1 <- row["geneA1_extracted"]
  A2 <- row["geneA2_extracted"]
  B1 <- row["geneB1_extracted"]
  B2 <- row["geneB2_extracted"]
  
  data.frame(
    fam = rep(fam, 6),
    gene1 = c(A1, B1, A1, A1, A2, A2),
    gene2 = c(A2, B2, B1, B2, B1, B2),
    type  = c("recent_WGD", "recent_WGD", rep("ancient_WGD", 4)),
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
}))


```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
